Job Title: UX / UI Web Designer

Location: Sioux Falls, SD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
The UX / UI Designer at Epicosity plays a critical role in shaping the user experience and visual design of our web projects by ensuring that our digital interfaces are intuitive, engaging, and visually compelling.We are searching for the right candidate and are willing to explore in-person, remote, or hybrid remote working arrangements. 
ResponsibilitiesTranslate user expectations into quality designs: Work with strategy team members to understand project documentation, specifically user stories, and design online interfaces that effectively meet user needs and enhance the overall user experience.Wireframe Creation: Develop detailed wireframes that lay out the structure and content arrangement of web pages. These wireframes will serve as the foundational blueprint for website design and will guide backend development.Set Overall Site Theme: Define the overarching aesthetic and thematic elements of the website, ensuring it aligns with the brand identity and enhances user experience. This includes setting design guidelines for color schemes, typography, graphics, and layout styles.Prototype Design: Create high-fidelity prototypes that simulate user interactions and interface design across pages and navigation elements.Interactivity and Animation: Design and integrate interactive elements and animations that enhance the website's navigational flow and engage users effectively where it makes sense to do so.Collaboration: Work closely with web developers to ensure designs are implemented correctly, leveraging their expertise in HubSpot CMS for seamless integration and functionality.Design for Accessibility: Ensure all final design work is in compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards.Development Collaboration: Work closely with web developers to ensure designs are implemented with technical precision within HubSpot CMS.Stay tuned in: Maintain and apply the latest industry standards in UX design, focusing on usability, accessibility, and functionality.Continuous Improvement: Iterate on designs based on user feedback and analytics to continuously improve the user experience.Production Design: Assist on production design projects in between primary UI / UX project assignments
QualificationsDesign Proficiency: Ability to create engaging design concepts and user interfaces using Figma. Skilled in crafting wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity visuals.Front-end Design: Strong understanding of responsive design principles and front-end development practices, including familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ability to design within the constraints of HubSpot CMS.Technical Savvy: Knowledge of version control, testing, and debugging methods that complement design processes.User-Centric Approach: Demonstrated experience in conducting user research, usability testing, and incorporating feedback to refine designs.Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, Web Design, or a closely related field.Professional Experience: At least 3 years of professional experience in UI/UX design, with a proven track record of successful web projects.Technical Knowledge: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript; understands the technical implications of design decisions. Familiarity with SEO principles and how they influence design and user experience.Best Practices: Deep understanding of web accessibility, usability, and current design best practices.Platform Knowledge: Familiarity with HubSpot CMS platform and relevant HubSpot Academy certifications such as CMS for Marketers and CMS for Developers preferred but not required.

Experience Level (if available): None
